Statute.Title: Marine Atlantic Inc. Acquisition Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Marine Atlantique S.C.C., Loi autorisant l’acquisition de)

General.Text: Related amendments, ss. 10 and 11 (see R.S., c. 28 (2nd Supp.), ss. 1 and 2)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1986, c. 36 in force on assent 27.06.86 except ss. 8 to 11 proclaimed in force 31.12.86 see SI/87‑25
